event.description:
Do you start clicking mouth-wateringly beautiful snaps of the pizza ordered, as soon as it hits your table?

Then you must participate in this fantastic #Contest!.

Order pizzas of your choice, Click enticing pizza shots, Flaunt your best Pizza snap & Win!

*Terms & Conditions:

1. One entry per person is allowed.
2. You should be the master of the awe-striking photograph.
3. Wisely pick the best & ignore the rest (multiple photos will be disqualified).
4. Only Puffizza Pizza snaps can make you win.
5. Mentioning Name of the pizza along with the click is compulsory.
6. Capture with any camera or mobile’s camera you wish.
7. #NoFilter please! (Photo editing & manipulation is strictly NOT allowed).
8. Participants should post their click along with hashtag (#FlauntYourPizza Contest) below the Contest Creative & also inbox us the high quality image BEFORE 15th April 11:59 PM.
9. The renowned professional photographer MR. Prashant Nair will choose Top 5 Captures.
10. If your snap stands out the rest, on 20th April, 2017 your name will be declared as a winner with zest.
11. Top 5 Photographs will be showcased at #Puffizza & the masters of the outstanding pieces will be honoured with Puffizza #Vouchers. 
12. Puffizza officials decision will be final.
event.title: #FlauntYourPizza Contest
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.
